title: Add option for tests to not randomize codec
description: This is particularly useful when creating the backcompat indexes, since it is a pain to figure out which codec you need to specify to avoid being randomized.  Something like -Dtests.codec=default could simply bypass the randomization of the codec.

comments.author: Ryan Ernst
comments.content: Simple patch.  I couldn't find anywhere that was testing the codec randomization, but if someone knows about one, I'd love to add a test...
